nodes.bodyText: Should say "connected to a logical server" than "in game"

I think this is fine, this field in particular only says "currently, we're viewing THIS world". It doesn't really say anything about a server connection in my opinion. (also: isn't this field null while connected and still in the login phase?)
maybe just link to minecraft wiki
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -85,6 +85,9 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1937 net/minecraft/world/World ARG 2 entity ARG 3 direction METHOD method_27982 isDebugWorld ()Z + COMMENT Checks if this world is a debug world. + COMMENT + COMMENT

Debug worlds are not modifiable and are typically meant for development and debug use only.
